Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Ciprofloxacin-S (0.004 - 8 µg/mL)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Ciprofloxacin-S for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-negative bacilli.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli, specifically for ciprofloxacin susceptibility testing with Salmonella Typhi.
